name: Depth Map (Depth Anything V2)
description: Extract depth maps from images using Depth Anything V2. Useful for VFX compositing, parallax effects, 3D scene reconstruction, and ControlNet conditioning. The ViT-Large model provides the best accuracy.
tips: ViT-Large (vitl) is most accurate, ViT-Small (vits) is fastest
Output is a grayscale depth map (white = near, black = far)
Chain with ControlNet for depth-guided generation
Useful for creating parallax effects in DaVinci Resolve
